name: Aditi Joshi
follow_up_instructions: Limit sodium intake to 2000mg per day
Weigh yourself daily and report sudden weight gain (>2 lbs in 24 hours)
discharge_summary:
Patient Aditi Joshi was admitted on 2025-08-26 with Diabetic Nephropathy. 
During hospitalization, patient was managed with Atorvastatin 20mg at bedtime, Sodium bicarbonate 650mg three times daily, Amlodipine 5mg daily. 
Procedures performed included Kidney stone removal (ureteroscopy), Ultrasound-guided kidney drainage, Peritoneal dialysis catheter insertion.
Patient's condition improved and was stable at discharge. 
Discharged home with instructions to follow up with nephrologist and continue medications as prescribed. 
Patient educated on warning signs and dietary restrictions.
